increased_productivity.body: With clear communication, you can focus on what matters, be better organized and provide better replies.

stress_free.body: timyo ends the pressure of the automatic ASAP email status quo, making all email less stressful.

clear_expectations.body: Not all emails are created equal. Many don't need an answer. Most can wait until tomorrow. Choose when you would like a response and what kind of response you’re looking for.

clear_priorities.body: With Timyo, recipients know exactly what senders are looking for as soon as they see an email. As a Timyo user, you don't even need to open your email to know when and how to deal with it.

schedule_email.body: Shifting between tasks kills our productivity. Even taking a minute to respond to an email pulls your focus and distracts you from everything else you’ve got going on.

expected_replies.body: Because you send email with clear expectations. We let you know when a reply is pending or overdue.

smart_notifications.body: Choose to be notified only for emails that require your immediate attention (Today, VIPs).

notify_sender.body: With just one click, inform the sender when you plan on dealing with their request.

cc_bcc_insights.body: CC or BCC messages are tagged in your inbox. Now you now know which emails may require more attention.

security_first.body: We provide physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards to protect the confidentiality of your information.

todo_integration.body: Create your own To-Do straight from your inbox. Just send yourself an email with expectation.

testimonials.body: "Not only does Timyo reduce the time I need to sift through emails it does the same for every one of my team members and that makes for a much more productive team."
